Uses of Package
org.apache.lucene.queries.function

Packages that use org.apache.lucene.queries.function
org.apache.lucene.queries Filters and Queries that add to core Lucene. 
org.apache.lucene.queries.function Queries that compute score based upon a function 
org.apache.lucene.queries.function.docvalues FunctionValues for different data types. 
org.apache.lucene.queries.function.valuesource A variety of functions to use with FunctionQuery. 
 

Classes in org.apache.lucene.queries.function used by org.apache.lucene.queries
FunctionQuery
          Returns a score for each document based on a ValueSource, often some function of the value of a field.
 

Classes in org.apache.lucene.queries.function used by org.apache.lucene.queries.function
FunctionQuery.FunctionWeight
           
FunctionValues
          Represents field values as different types.
FunctionValues.ValueFiller
          Abstraction of the logic required to fill the value of a specified doc into a reusable MutableValue.
ValueSource
          Instantiates FunctionValues for a particular reader.
ValueSourceScorer
          Scorer which returns the result of FunctionValues.floatVal(int) as the score for a document.
 

Classes in org.apache.lucene.queries.function used by org.apache.lucene.queries.function.docvalues
FunctionValues
          Represents field values as different types.
FunctionValues.ValueFiller
          Abstraction of the logic required to fill the value of a specified doc into a reusable MutableValue.
ValueSource
          Instantiates FunctionValues for a particular reader.
ValueSourceScorer
          Scorer which returns the result of FunctionValues.floatVal(int) as the score for a document.

          Abstraction of the logic required to fill the value of a specified doc into a reusable MutableValue.
